long_description: At the top of the fork-mount food chain, the Yakima Viper bike mount supplies premium performance and drop-dead styling. Carry almost any bike with the 9mm stainless-steel skewer. Easy-adjusting red lever provides quick installation and security, even when mounted outside the tower. Ergonomically designed lever has same-side adjustment. Fits the widest range of tires and rims with the wheeltray and wheelstrap design. Mounts equally well to round or square crossbars. Lockable with Yakima SKS cores, sold separately.
short_description: At the top of the fork-mount food chain, the Yakima Viper bike mount supplies premium performance and drop-dead styling.
